attributes.additional_details:
I THINK THE GOVERMENT SHOULD GIVE THE MONEY TO PEOPLE LIKE ME WHO DESPARATE NEED THE MONEY
EG I MOVE TO A NEW PROPERTY AND THE FLAT WAS NOT DONEI HAD TO DO ALL THE FLAT WITH MY OWN MONEY WHICH PUT ME INTO DEBT WHICH IS BAD I APPLY FOR COMMMUNITY CARE GRANT BUT THE MONEY WAS NOT GIVEN TO ME I HAD TO SLEEP IN A FROSTY COLD FLAT SINCE 2006 WHEN I MOVE TO THE PROPERTY. WHICH WAS IN A DAMP, MOULDED AND DIRT. NOT GOOD TO LIVE INSIDE. I HAD TO APPLY FOR BUGETING LOAN CRISIS LOAN  TO THE  FLAT UP
I THINK THE COMMMUNITY CARE GRANT SHOULD BE GIVEN TO ALL WORKS OF LIVE NOT JUST A PRISON OR A TERMINAL ILL PERSON, OR A FUNNERAL ARRANGEMENT,OR DISTANCE REVISITED
I THINK THE COMMUNITY CARE GRANT SHOULD BE GIVEN TO EVERY ONE NOT JUST FOR THOSE PEOPLE  LISTED ON THE APPLICATION FORM.

rejection.details: This is on a personal matter.
